title: Kimono, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: tied-resist patterned (shibori) and painted
description: Kimono with very long sleeves made up of several silks in red and blue with tied-resist patterns, with a wide border of crepe painted with a leaf and flower design. Double border at bottom and along collar. Lined with red silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Kimono, early 20th century.Medium: silk
Technique: tied-resist patterned (shibori) and painted. 1951-112-10-b.
